aanandabodhikatha                                         347 wannapaththa patimukka sundaraparikkhara, silagunadi sarawirahithaththa chiththakammalangkathaguthaghatawiya, sihachamma paruthagadra bha wiya, sugandharaththasalipatibhagathappalapa wiya, simbalirukhadayo wiya antho nissara dussilyatha guthapunna samanagadra bha samanapalapa anthoputhi sathatha nissandana medakathalika wiya nirantharanissandana kilesa kasambujatha samanakarandawa sakalalokassa kusalabhandaෙththalanakamabhawora patichchannasaggamokkha magga wisodhitha apayamagga nirayaggi alathabhutha theyyoparibhogika sambuddha pathikutta nichchubbigugahadaya aggikkhandhupamasuththe wuththadukkha patiggahaka karu nikajananan karunaya waththubhutha papa nama”yi.
